short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RoyaleCases.com XP Calculator shows you how much XP and how many coins you need to wager for next level

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that shows you how much XP and how many coins you need to wager for next level. 

Extension is active in your profile page, check screenshot for preview and see what other features you can get!

Changelog:
1.0.1 - Fixed typo
